full_summary:
### SSC KVMs for Department of National Defence- Amendment 003

This is an amendment to the Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of KVMs and cables for the Department of National Defence.

#### Tender Details

*   **Solicitation Number**: BSPM018509/22283
*   **Publication Date**: 14 March 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 29 March 2023, at 14:00:00
*   **Subject**: SSH SCM KVMs Bid Alert for DEFF STDIO lDIG MIL MIL
*   **Location**: Ontario (except NCR)
*   **procurementMethod-methodeApprovisionnement-eng**: Competitive - Open bidding

#### Description of Requirement 

The Department of National Defence requires 1300 KVMs and 1000 cables, with an additional 1300 KVMs and 1000 cables as client options. These procurements are required to support the Royal Canadian Air Force's lifecycle effort for the AFCCIS infrastructure under the Next Gen Data Centre initiative. The procurement must respect the configuration imposed by DIMEI and adhere to the standards for all sites.

Delivery is mandatory within 30 days from contract award, with a delivery destination of Gatineau, Quebec. The Government procures this directly on the supplier's site [Shared Services Canada](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login).

Documentation may be submitted in either official language of Canada, and any enquiries should be addressed in writing to Rashawn Griffith, Procurement Officer at Shared Services Canada.

[Official Tender Link](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login).

### Important Details

*   This procurement is set-aside for indigenous businesses
*   The requirement will be solicited for a Belkin 4-port 2-head DP/HDMI universal KVM, or an equivalent product
*   The bidder with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract
